content.prompt: In the mural Dream of a Sunday Afternoon in the Alameda Park, Diego Rivera included figures that spanned four centuries most probably to convey the idea that

choices.label: artists and writers have played a critical role in Mexico’s history
all Mexicans are a part of the country’s rich, ongoing history
Mexicans suffered for years under the rule of dictators
the Mexican Revolution was the beginning of a glorious new era

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art
